title: Jackass Presents Bad Grandpa 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC ADES
description:
Irving Zisman ( Johnny Knoxville ) is an elderly 86 year old who is on a journey across the United States with an unlikely company , his grandson 8 years old named Billy ( Jackson Nicoll ) . They will take the audience on a journey of insane road filmed by hidden cameras . Throughout the trip Irving will present young Billy to people, places and situations that give new meaning to the term educate a child . The pair will meet with male strippers , dissatisfied children competing in a beauty contest ( and their equally dissatisfied mothers ) , a funeral home staff , managers biker bar, plus several people who did not suspect anything of what is happening . Real people in unreal situations , creating a fun comedy and controversy ..
